synopsis.text:
Six teen-year-old Yuta Okkotsu is a timid high school student with a unique and dangerous problem. His childhood friend, Rika, has become a powerful curse and refuses to leave his side. After catching the attention of Satoru Gojo, a renowned jujutsu sorcerer and teacher at Tokyo Jujutsu High School, Yuta is given the opportunity to learn how to control Rika and protect himself and others from her deadly power.

As Yuta begins his training at the mysterious school, he struggles to find his place among his talented classmates, including the selectively mute Toge Inumaki, weapons expert Maki Zenin, and the lovable Panda. But when the cunning and ruthless curse user, Suguru Geto, sets his sights on Rika, Yuta must find the strength and confidence to defend himself and his friends against the looming threat.

With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, Yuta must confront his own demons and harness the power of Rika to stop Geto's genocidal plot and protect those he cares about. Will Yuta be able to break Rika's curse and find the confidence to embrace his own life? Only time will tell in this thrilling supernatural adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
